ED_Title: Confirmation of the appointment of the Administrator of the United Nations Development Programme
ED_DecisionText:
At its 76th plenary meeting, on 19 April 2017, the General Assembly confirmed the appointment by the Secretary-General of Mr. Achim STEINER of Germany as Administrator of the United Nations Development Programme for a four-year term of office. 

Subsequently, the Secretary-General informed the General Assembly that Mr. Achim STEINER’s term of office would be from 17 June 2017 to 16 June 2021.

(See A/71/871 and Add.1; A/71/PV.76)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/71/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
